description.narrative:
Project Outcomes:
Gap: The VC funding gap is assessed as small relative to other emerging markets. However, it is noted that the Fund is in the very early VC stage (Seed/ Series A) which is a riskier segment and lacks sophisticated institutional funds. This stage of the Fund is also critical to develop a quality late stage pipeline of startups. During diligence, the amount of capital invested into investees operating in the more underpenetrated parts of the SE Asia region will also be considered.
Outcomes: Access to early stage capital and operational support leading to increased ability of startups to scale and succeed. During diligence, information on investee performance, follow-on funding and value creation strategies used by the Fund Manager will be assessed to set targets and assess the intensity of the project.
Contribution to Market Creation:
The largest contribution to market creation is expected to come from the sector specific impacts of digital investees. Increased competitiveness of key markets through the support of market-disrupting digital business models: By investing in technology-enabled solutions across a variety of B2B, enterprise and deep-tech sectors, the Fund will assist in the development of the region's digital economy. The Fund's innovative investees bring new business models, ometimes into underserved parts of the region, demonstrating the viability of early-stage VC investments in a region where VC funding is still in its infancy; thereby bringing more competitors into the market, increasing efficiency and driving down market-wide costs. It will be expected that at least two of the Fund's investees will change market structure.

Wavemaker Pacific 4 L.P. (Wavemaker SEA Fund IV or the Fund) is targeted to be a US$120 million Venture Capital (VC) fund focused on early stage (seed to pre-A) investments in the Southeast Asia (SEA) region. The Fund aims to invest primarily in enterprise/ business-to-business (B2B) and deep tech companies led by exceptional entrepreneurs creating superior value by leveraging technology to deliver high-impact Automation, Data & Intelligence.
